TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DiscoveryDocumentSearchPattern extends System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern
Public NotInheritable Class DiscoveryDocumentSearchPattern Inherits DiscoverySearchPattern

Docs.summary: Obtains the file locations of Web services discovery documents for use in populating another Web services discovery document. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentSearchPattern> class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoverySearchPattern> class and is employed by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method, which handles an HTTP request for a discovery document. Normally, none of these classes need to be used directly by a developer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference GetDiscoveryReference(string filename) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDiscoveryReference (filename As String) As DiscoveryReference

Docs.param: The file system path of the discovery document.
Docs.summary: Returns the object for a given discovery document.
Docs.returns: A object that specifies the location of a .vsdisco file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The concrete <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> class inherits from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference> class.
A <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> instance contains the location of the .vsdisco file, which is also the file system directory corresponding to the HTTP request passed to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Pattern As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Pattern { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the file name pattern to use as a search target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The pattern "*.vsdisco" indicates a .vsdisco Web services discovery document extension. The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentLinksPattern> class, on the other hand, indicates a .disco extension.
